Package cellularAutomata.movie

Class Summary
DataAtomOutputStream This output stream filter supports common data types used inside of QuickTime Data Atoms.
Example  
FilterImageOutputStream FilterImageOutputStream adapts a ImageOutputStream to the FilterOutputStream interface.
FrameRatePanel Creates a panel that lets the user choose a frame rate.
ImageDirToMovMain Opens a file chooser and lets you choose a directory which must either contain JPG images or PNG images and then writes them all into a QuickTime movie file with 30 frames per second.
MovieMaker Convenience methods for making a movie from images generated by the CA Explorer.
QuickTimeOutputStream This class supports writing of images as frames into the video track of a QuickTime movie file.
 

Enum Summary
QuickTimeOutputStream.VideoFormat Supported video encodings.
